---
title: Lower Cervical Spine Manipulation (HVLAT)
---

# Safety


# Technique

You will be moving the patient's head into SB and Rotation. The direction you are sidebending and rotating will be considered ipsilateral.

- Split stance
- Hips pointing towards the direction you will HVLAT towards
- With your I/L hand (the hand on the side of the patient you are moving them towards) you will place it at the mid C/S
    - Apply a C/L Lateral shift
